entry.title: My Take on the Shadow Broker
entry.content:
Enjoy this while playing your favorite XBox game and kicking ass the Asari way.

Ingredients:

  • 1 shot Blue Curacao

  • 2 shots Vodka (Pick your poison, but I stick with Grey Goose)

  • 2 shots Hypnotiq

  • Lemon-Lime soda (I prefer Sprite)

  • Margarita mix

  • 8-10 Blueberries

  • Ice (optional, your liquor should be cold already)

Process:

  1. Place the blueberries in the glass.

  2. Add vodka

  3. Add Hypnotiq

  4. Add Blue Curacao

  5. Pour equal parts soda and Margarita mix to top
